name: SiteTour
0:
”Alexa, Load Site Tour”
”Tell me about the amenities present in this building”
”How many bathrooms do we have in this unit”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: site tour
Developer Terms of Use
des: There's a new way to enhance self-guided apartment tours. Through Entrata, property managers can assign voice-guided tours to prospective renters. The prospect will be sent a unique, customized code and upon entering the unit, the Amazon device will ask for the code to be recited back. Once the code is confirmed, the prospect can then interact with Alexa to ask additional questions about the property or the unit they are touring.
